cleaned_text: Homeopathy refers to a system of medicine where patients are treated with substances that have been highly diluted, under the premise of treating "like with like." This means that a substance which caused an illness or negative symptom in large doses can heal it in minute doses. The homeopath will prescribe remedies based on the symptoms of the patient.
